name: Crystal Anarchy
description:
Crystal Anarchy, the adventures inside a land taken by evil spirits! Doors of hell have been closed, return their crystals to reopen them and let evil return to where it belongs!

A classic 2.5D platformer with some twists! Shoot balls of light against your enemies and use prisms to reflect, refract or magnify your light!

Use your keyboard to control the movement and your mouse to aim and shoot. Also compatible with gamepads.

This game was developed by Tiago Duarte and Marco Afonso as a 3D project for the bachelor degree in Digital Games and Multimedia @ IPLeiria
